onboarding.welcome.title: Welcome, Caster
onboarding.welcome.subtitle: A brief orientation before we proceed
onboarding.welcome.body: Thaumic Cast channels audio from your browser to your Sonos speakers. Think of it as a magical conduit, except the magic is networking and the wand is a browser extension.

onboarding.desktop.subtitle: Your local anchor to the speaker realm

onboarding.desktop.not_found: The Desktop App has not been summoned. It serves as the bridge to your speakers.

onboarding.desktop.manual_hint: For non-standard ports or remote servers

onboarding.speakers.subtitle: Let's see who's listening

onboarding.ready.title: The Ritual is Complete
onboarding.ready.subtitle: Your speakers await instruction
onboarding.ready.intro: You can stream audio from up to {{maxStreams}} tabs at once. The universe has limits.
onboarding.ready.performance_body: Best for music. Latency is 100–300ms — fine for tunes, less so for conducting orchestras.
onboarding.ready.battery_warning: Laptops on battery may experience hiccups. Browsers like to save power.
